mapper.insert: insert into PARKING (parkingIdx, PARKINGNAME, PARKINGTYPE, MIN30FEE, ADDMIN10FEE, PLACE, sample4_postcode, sample4_roadAddress, sample4_jibunAddress, sample4_detailAddress, sample4_extraAddress, dayTime, weeTime, holTime, aptMap, parkingPic, id, PARKINGDATE) values( PARKING_SEQ.nextval, #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{min30Fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addMin10Fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{place,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sample4_postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sample4_roadAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sample4_jibunAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sample4_detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sample4_extraAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{holTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aptMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select PARKINGNAME, parkingType, min30Fee, addMin10Fee, place, sample4_postcode, sample4_roadAddress, sample4_jibunAddress, sample4_detailAddress, sample4_extraAddress, dayTime, weeTime, holTime, aptMap, parkingPic from PARKING where PARKINGNAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, PARKINGNAME, PARKINGTYPE, PLACE, SAMPLE4_ROADADDRESS, SAMPLE4_DETAILADDRESS, SAMPLE4_EXTRAADDRESS, PARKINGDATE from PARKING
select PARKINGPIC, PARKINGNAME, DAYTIME, WEETIME, HOLTIME, place from PARKING
